attributes.action: WE ARE ALL IN THIS TOGETHER
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED THINK THAT THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD LEAD THE WAY BY EXAMPLE IN THIS TIME OF AUSTERITY BY CAPPING ALL MP'S WAGES TO 75K AT THE TOP,DECREASING WITH POSITION AND TO GIVE UP SECOND HOMES AND USE PREMIER INN ROOMS FOR THOSE WHO HAVE TO TRAVEL (2ND CLASS TRAIN TICKETS)TO WESTMINSTER, &
CAP ALL HIGH EARNERS TO A WAGE LIMIT OF 60K AS THIS IS MORE THAN ENOUGH TO FUND THEIR JOBS, PLUS CAP MP EXPENSES TO BARE MINIMUM TO ENABLE THEM TO DO THEIR JOB. THIS WOULD HELP SAVE MONEY TO HELP FUND NHS,SCHOOLS,SOCIAL SECURITY ETC AND STOP THE CUTS TO THOSE WHO ARE VUNERABLE IN THE LOW INCOME BRACKET,INCLUDING THOSE WORKING ON LOW INCOMES, WITH A MINIMUM WAGE SET AT £8.00
